item.title: MSAL
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: MSAL stands for Microsoft Authentication Library. It’s the replacement for ADAL, the Active Directory Authentication Library. Although Microsoft now definitely pushes cloud hard like most tech companies. So MSAL is focused on Azure AD specifically. Where there is a distinct difference between “organizational” accounts and normal public Microsoft services account.
